title: Decision Time: Step Up or Slip Back
text:
Step up the fight!

World leaders, civil society leaders, CEOs, activists, philanthropists, advocates and people affected by HIV, TB and malaria are gathering on 9 and 10 October to make a decision. Do we step up the fight against these diseases, or do we allow ourselves to slip back?

The Global Fund’s Sixth Replenishment Conference in Lyon, France aims to raise at least US$14 billion to help save 16 million lives, avert 234 million infections and help the world get back on track to end the three diseases.
